scripts.build: pnpm run rollup && pnpm exec tsc-alias -p prod.tsconfig.json && pnpm run move-package
scripts.gen-declaration: pnpm exec tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly -p prod.tsconfig.json && pnpm exec tsc-alias -p prod.tsconfig.json
scripts.doc:gen-translation-json: run(){ if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then echo "No Language Code provided. Going for en as default"; pnpm exec typedoc --options ./translation.typedoc.json --emit none; else echo "Language Code is: $1"; pnpm exec typedoc --options ./translation.typedoc.json --l10nCode $1 --emit none; fi;}; run
scripts.doc:inject-translation-json: run(){ if [ $# -eq 0 ]; then echo "No Language Code provided. Going for en as default"; pnpm exec typedoc --options ./translation.typedoc.json --translationMode inject --readme ./translations/staging/en/README.md --out ./docs-staging/en; else echo "Language Code is: $1"; pnpm exec typedoc --options ./translation.typedoc.json --l10nCode $1 --readme ./translations/staging/$1/README.md --translationMode inject --out ./docs-staging/$1; fi;}; run
